001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.feature;
002
003import org.bukkit.World;
004import org.bukkit.block.Block;
005import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode;
006import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.ConfigSerializable;
007import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.meta.Required;
008import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException;
009
010import java.util.ArrayList;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.Optional;
013
014import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.DemeterPlugin;
015import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.Feature;
016import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.WorldsConfig;
017import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.biome.BiomeData;
018
019public class Climate extends Feature<Climate.Config> {
020    public static final String ID = "climate";
021
022    public static final String FACTOR_BIOME = "biome";
023    public static final String FACTOR_ALTITUDE = "altitude";
024
025    // Utils
026
027    @ConfigSerializable
028    public record State(
029            double temperature,
030            double humidity
031    ) {
032        public State multiply(double v) {
033            return new State(
034                    temperature * v,
035                    humidity * v
036            );
037        }
038    }
039
040    // Config
041
042    @ConfigSerializable
043    public static final class Config {
044        transient Climate feature;
045        public final @Required WorldsConfig<WorldConfig> worlds;
046
047        private Config() {
048            worlds = new WorldsConfig<>();
049        }
050
051        void initialize(Climate feature) {
052            this.feature = feature;
053        }
054    }
055
056    @ConfigSerializable
057    public static final class Biomes {
058        public final double temperatureMultiplier;
059        public final double humidityMultiplier;
060
061        private Biomes() {
062            temperatureMultiplier = 1;
063            humidityMultiplier = 0.5;
064        }
065    }
066
067    @ConfigSerializable
068    public static final class Altitude {
069        public final double optimal;
070        public final State multiplier;
071
072        private Altitude() {
073            optimal = 64;
074            multiplier = new State(0.015, 0);
075        }
076    }
077
078    @ConfigSerializable
079    public static final class WorldConfig {
080        public final Biomes biomes;
081        public final Altitude altitude;
082
083        private WorldConfig() {
084            biomes = new Biomes();
085            altitude = new Altitude();
086        }
087    }
088
089    public Climate(DemeterPlugin plugin) {
090        super(plugin);
091    }
092
093    @Override public String id() { return ID; }
094
095    @Override
096    public void configure(ConfigurationNode config) throws SerializationException {
097        this.config = config.get(Config.class);
098        if (this.config == null)
099            throw new SerializationException("null");
100        this.config.initialize(this);
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public void enable() {
105        if (config == null)
106            return;
107    }
108
109    @Override
110    public void disable() {}
111
112    public record FactorEntry(String key, State value) {}
113
114    public List<FactorEntry> stateFactors(Block block) {
115        World world = block.getWorld();
116        List<FactorEntry> factors = new ArrayList<>();
117
118        config.worlds.get(world).ifPresent(worldConfig -> {
119            Optional.ofNullable(plugin.biomeInjector().get(block.getBiome().getKey())).ifPresent(entry -> {
120                BiomeData biome = entry.biomeData();
121                if (biome != null) {
122                    factors.add(new FactorEntry(FACTOR_BIOME, new State(
123                            (biome.temperature() - 0.5) * worldConfig.biomes.temperatureMultiplier,
124                            biome.humidity() * worldConfig.biomes.humidityMultiplier
125                    )));
126                }
127            });
128
129            factors.add(new FactorEntry(FACTOR_ALTITUDE,
130                    worldConfig.altitude.multiplier.multiply(worldConfig.altitude.optimal - block.getY())));
131        });
132
133        return factors;
134    }
135
136    public State state(List<FactorEntry> factors) {
137        double temperature = 0, humidity = 0;
138        for (var factor : factors) {
139            temperature += factor.value.temperature;
140            humidity += factor.value.humidity;
141        }
142        return new State(temperature, humidity);
143    }
144
145    public State state(Block block) {
146        return state(stateFactors(block));
147    }
148}
